title: Recommended Books
cleaned_text: Recommended Books - The Power by: John Adams, D.C. - For The Love Of Children by: Dr. Louis R. Briegel II & Stacey A. Stefanski - Chicken Soup For The Chiropractic Soul by: Jack Canfield, Mark Victor Hansen, & Dr. Fabrizio Mancini - A Shot In The Dark by: Harris Coulter, & Barbara Loe Fisher - Excitotoxins, The Taste That Kills by: ? - Tooth Truth by: Frank J. Jerome, D.D.S. - Flouride, The Aging Factor by: Dr. John Wiamouyiannis - Vaccines: Are They Really Safe & Effective? by: Neil Z. Miller - Natural Cures They Don't Want You To Know About by: Kevin Trudeau - Your Body's Many Cries For Water by: F. Batmanghelidj, M.D. - Vaccines, Autism, & Childhood Disorders by: Neil Z. Miller - It's All In Your Head by: Hal Huggins, D.D.S. - VacccinationSocial Violence, & Criminality by: Harris L. Coulter - The PH Miracle by: Robert Young, D.C. - Sick, & Tired by: Robert Young, D.C. - A Parents Guide to Raising Healthy, Purposeful Children by Dr. Kevin Pallis & Dr. Ed Plentz - Finding That Something In You by Dr. Edward G. Plentz III - The Secret by Rhonda Byrne (Also available on DVD) - A Parent's Guide to Raising Healthy, Purposeful Children by: Dr. Kevin Pallis and Dr. Ed Plentz (Also available on CD) (Available in our office)
